thread.title: TTC Extra: Domestic Violence Victim Sentenced To Jail To The Contrary
thread.title_full: Video: TTC Extra: Domestic Violence Victim Sentenced To Jail | Watch To The Contrary Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: TTC Extra: Domestic Violence Victim Sentenced To Jail To The Contrary
text: A Florida Court judge, sentenced a mother, strangled in front of her child, 3 days in jail for failing to appear at her abusers trial. PANEL: Ashe Schow, Lara Brown, Clara Del Villar, Anushay Hossain
